as_solution_provider.description: The need for a sustainable, low-carbon, low-resource and regenerative economy presents risks, but also opportunities for businesses to innovate and play a major role in this needed new era.
benefits: More sustainable solutions to reduce your footprint

share_experience.description: We believe inspiration is key to achieve meaningful impact: our Buddies prove it! They are individuals who dare change the status quo in or with their company, and they share their experience with all.

tmi_volunteer.description: The Matcha Initiative is a not-for-profit organisation and volunteer-based. Join us to build Best Practices sections, organise monthly evenings or masterclasses, write resources, raise awareness through communication & socials...

altercop_volunteer.description: AlterCOP is our annual flagship summit. It is a remote alternative to COP, keeping people informed about the happenings there in real-time, all without travelling across the world! During 2 weeks in November, we make sustainability more accessible and foster regional sharing & collaboration.
